body: I emailed support@avicus.net about my ban... And I was wondering how long it would take for him/her to get back to me... Thanks
body_tagged: I emailed support@avicus.net about my ban... And I was wondering how long it would take for him/her to get back to me... Thanks
title: Support@Avicus.net

replies.body: To get a reply, it can take anywhere from 1 week, to 1 month. If you do not get a reply within 1 week, just resend the email. Good luck! :)
replies.body_tagged: To get a reply, it can take anywhere from 1 week, to 1 month. If you do not get a reply within 1 week, just resend the email. Good luck! :)

replies.body: It usually takes 1 or 2 days, but recently we have been low on Senior Staff, so it might be a bit longer. Although, we will have more Sr. Staff soon!
replies.body_tagged: It usually takes 1 or 2 days, but recently we have been low on Senior Staff, so it might be a bit longer. Although, we will have more Sr. Staff soon!

replies.body:
I'm going to tell you the truth because Dreams and Spartamex are wrong.
This days, Sr mods barely check the e-mail, why?, I don't known..
You won't get a response unless they check e-mail again but that will happen in a long time, maybe, even a year.
Also, if you contact them on Skype, they won't answer you as they afk all the time, my hopes are on Tel so het his Skype and ask him for an appeal.
I'm telling him the truth so please no hate.
replies.body_tagged:
I'm going to tell you the truth because Dreams and Spartamex are wrong.
This days, Sr mods barely check the e-mail, why?, I don't known..
You won't get a response unless they check e-mail again but that will happen in a long time, maybe, even a year.
Also, if you contact them on Skype, they won't answer you as they afk all the time, my hopes are on Tel so het his Skype and ask him for an appeal.
I'm telling him the truth so please no hate.

replies.body:
No, they are both correct. Typically it would be a matter of days, but we are getting caught up from a recent influx of emails. 

Wait a week, if you don't hear back, try to get in direct contact via Skype or in-game. You can resend the email, but we're probably not going to get to it faster as we are on a first-come-first-serve basis.

replies.body: Ok, but I don't have Skype... How else can I contact them?

replies.body: And what if all Sr mods blocked you from Skype?

replies.body: Good point, I have no idea... I just want to continue playing on Avicus. I've even been supporting the channel on Youtube, and there's been a misunderstanding about my ban... I just want to be unbanned so I can continue making Youtube videos and playing Walls...
replies.body_tagged: Good point, I have no idea... I just want to continue playing on Avicus. I've even been supporting the channel on Youtube, and there's been a misunderstanding about my ban... I just want to be unbanned so I can continue making Youtube videos and playing Walls...

replies.body: To both of you, wait and we'll send a response via email, assuming the appeal has some validity and content.
replies.body_tagged: To both of you, wait and we'll send a response via email, assuming the appeal has some validity and content.

replies.body: Ok, but just to make sure, is there a ban appeal format that we need?
replies.body_tagged: Ok, but just to make sure, is there a ban appeal format that we need?

replies.body: You have to wait a while it could be anything to up to a monuth , however to be honest I'm not sure why but I emailed in 6monuths ago and no reply but maybe try forgot so just wait :)
replies.body_tagged: You have to wait a while it could be anything to up to a monuth , however to be honest I'm not sure why but I emailed in 6monuths ago and no reply but maybe try forgot so just wait :)

replies.body: TBH if your getting kicks and bans why would anyone want to play with you? (I'm not trying to b mean but sometimes you might have to think about what you say).
replies.body_tagged: TBH if your getting kicks and bans why would anyone want to play with you? (I'm not trying to b mean but sometimes you might have to think about what you say).

replies.body: Trust me dude, that'll never happen, they always say the same.
replies.body_tagged: Trust me dude, that'll never happen, they always say the same.

replies.body:
Ok, getting back from my 10 month ban I asked a lot of questions,the best way to contact them is in-game. I got my TeamSpeak rank yesterday from DoctaPop and on the support it could of taken like 2 weeks but I got it in a day. 

PS: it also helps making friends with mods..

replies.body:
Have you considered the possibility that we are telling the truth? Please, you're not helping the discussion. We go through emails daily on a first-come-first-serve basis. I don't know what you are basing your information on, but it's completely inaccurate and misleading.


@PaperNinja, Just send what you know about your ban and we'll tell you if we require more information.

replies.body:
I'm basing my opinion on other people's thoughts..
Everytime they send an e-mail, they complain about the long period of time an appeal takes to be answered and they're not few, they're more than 20 people.
Now, I'm not going to go on with the discussion as I don't care about this, I was just stating something real that needs to be solved ASAP.
